# Customer Success MCP Server Project

## Project Overview
Building a Python MCP server for Customer Success Management with:
- Authentication
- Call to Actions tool
- Healthscore tracking tool
- Survey/NPS email tool via AWS SES
- Account Risk Alerts feature

## Project Type
MCP Server (Model Context Protocol) - Python

## Key Features
1. JWT-based authentication
2. Call to Actions management
3. Health score tracking
4. NPS/Survey emails via AWS SES
5. Risk alert system
